title: Tor Version 3.6.4 - OS X (10.6+) Hidden Service Bundle
description:
UPDATE!!! [08/19/2014] Please don't use any old torrents. It is essential to keep everything updated.

Want your own Tor .onion site? This is the only preconfigured package to my knowledge. Easy and straight forward.

Note: You're gonna need a USB stick. It has to be labeled "Tor", otherwise you have to edit the torrc file to direct to your Keys folder.

Instructions:

1.) Download and Seed.

2.) Unzip Hidden_Service_Bundle2.zip to USB labeled Tor.

3.) Open and start MAMP. Just minimize after launch. (If no USB MAMP must be directed to your HiddenService folder.)

4.) Start Tor Browser

5.) Open the Keys folder. Open hostname. Copy .onion address.

6.) Put your webpage in the HiddenService folder.

7.) Check your .onion to see if it's working.

And that's all!
